item.title: By: Why Foton Was Right at MMOG Nation
item.dc:creator: Why Foton Was Right at MMOG Nation
item.description: [...] When he of the constantly [AFK] spoke of objecting to raids with no reward, this was what he was talking about: [...]
item.content:encoded: […] When he of the constantly [AFK] spoke of objecting to raids with no reward, this was what he was talking about: […]

item.title: By: Saylah
item.dc:creator: Saylah
item.description: I hear the Warlock is even more over powered that before. I'm still on hiatus but my son grabbed my lock and respec her Shadow Fury and is killing people with 1 or 2 hits. The priest forums are up in arms, so when I do come back I doubt it will be as my priest.
item.content:encoded: I hear the Warlock is even more over powered that before. I’m still on hiatus but my son grabbed my lock and respec her Shadow Fury and is killing people with 1 or 2 hits. The priest forums are up in arms, so when I do come back I doubt it will be as my priest.

item.title: By: Bluekar
item.dc:creator: Bluekar
item.description: I have had my fun running every spyware known to mankind, reinstalling WoW, and trying every work around that has been posted. I have also been playing Nightfall which is a lot of fun and a nice change of pace.
item.content:encoded: I have had my fun running every spyware known to mankind, reinstalling WoW, and trying every work around that has been posted. I have also been playing Nightfall which is a lot of fun and a nice change of pace.

item.title: By: Gemma
item.dc:creator: Gemma
item.description:
I'm not convinved you're missing all that much... I ended up levelling a lowbie as my main realm kept throwing me off after 30seconds, but i didnt find this out til 3minutes of lag later...
apparently everyone was in the bgs causing the lag, I didnt even get there hahaha! so far I LOVE the auto-loot (my little finger is saved!) and the self-buff feature - this makes such a difference when soloing healing classes.
So I've had fun looting and buffing... simple pleasures!
item.content:encoded:
I’m not convinved you’re missing all that much… I ended up levelling a lowbie as my main realm kept throwing me off after 30seconds, but i didnt find this out til 3minutes of lag later…

apparently everyone was in the bgs causing the lag, I didnt even get there hahaha! so far I LOVE the auto-loot (my little finger is saved!) and the self-buff feature – this makes such a difference when soloing healing classes.

So I’ve had fun looting and buffing… simple pleasures!

item.title: By: Bluekar
item.dc:creator: Bluekar
item.description: I will live vicariously though you Gemma. The side effect from my patching was "unable to validate game version." No WoW for me until they have a fix. So make sure you post all the juicy details of your priestly fun.
item.content:encoded: I will live vicariously though you Gemma. The side effect from my patching was “unable to validate game version.” No WoW for me until they have a fix. So make sure you post all the juicy details of your priestly fun.

item.title: By: Gemma
item.dc:creator: Gemma
item.description:
I'm taking advantage of the free respec and gonna have some fun with my priest in shadow, especially as theres no raiding for me atm anyway. Which meant I laughed at that^
PVP ftw.
item.content:encoded:
